description: Add directory location and filename format validation to prevent resource sheets from being created in wrong directories with incorrect naming conventions (ALL-CAPS vs PascalCase-with-hyphens)

orchestrator_instructions.role: Coordinate validation enhancement across papertrail (validator), coderef-docs (generator), and assistant (standards doc)

steps.step_1: READ communication.json to understand agent assignments
steps.step_3: VERIFY all agents completed their tasks
steps.step_4: SYNTHESIZE outputs into master validation enhancement report
steps.step_5: CREATE orchestrator-output.md with: validation coverage improvements, test results, integration verification

papertrail_instructions.role: Enhance ResourceSheetValidator with directory and naming checks

steps.step_2: ENHANCE validate_specific() method to add checks for: (1) Directory location must contain 'resources-sheets' or 'resource-sheets', (2) Filename format must match PascalCase-with-hyphens regex: ^[A-Z][a-z0-9]*(-[A-Z][a-z0-9]*)*-RESOURCE-SHEET$, (3) Subject field consistency with filename
steps.step_3: UPDATE existing filename warning (line 143-148) to ERROR severity for ALL-CAPS naming
steps.step_4: TEST validator against existing resource sheets
steps.step_5: CREATE papertrail-output.md with: code changes made, validation rules added, test results

coderef_docs_instructions.role: Enhance ResourceSheetGenerator to enforce correct location and naming

steps.step_2: ENHANCE generate() method to: (1) Auto-generate filename from subject field using PascalCase-with-hyphens, (2) Ensure output directory is coderef/resources-sheets/, (3) Validate before saving using ResourceSheetValidator
steps.step_3: ADD helper function: convert_subject_to_filename(subject: str) -> str that converts 'Auth Service' to 'Auth-Service-RESOURCE-SHEET.md'
steps.step_5: CREATE coderef-docs-output.md with: code changes made, filename generation logic, test results

coderef_assistant_instructions.role: Update existing RESOURCE-SHEET-STANDARDS.md with directory location and filename format rules

steps.step_2: ADD directory location section after line 46: 'Directory Location' section specifying coderef/resources-sheets/ (not coderef/reference-sheets/) with examples
steps.step_3: ENHANCE 'Naming Convention' section (lines 26-31) to explicitly define: PascalCase-with-hyphens format (Auth-Service-RESOURCE-SHEET.md) vs incorrect ALL-CAPS format (AUTH-SERVICE-RESOURCE-SHEET.md)
steps.step_4: ADD examples to 'Valid' section showing: Widget-System-RESOURCE-SHEET.md, File-Api-Route-RESOURCE-SHEET.md
steps.step_5: ADD examples to 'Invalid' section showing: FILE-API-ROUTE-RESOURCE-SHEET.md (ALL-CAPS), file-api-route-RESOURCE-SHEET.md (lowercase)
steps.step_6: UPDATE 'Validation Rules' section (line 263) to include directory location check and filename format check
steps.step_7: CREATE coderef-assistant-output.md documenting changes made to standards doc

quality_standards.completeness: All three agents (papertrail, coderef-docs, coderef-assistant) must complete their tasks. Validator must check directory + filename. Generator must auto-generate correct paths. Standards doc must define all rules.
quality_standards.accuracy: Regex patterns must correctly identify PascalCase-with-hyphens. Directory checks must validate against correct path. Subject-to-filename conversion must be accurate.
quality_standards.format: Outputs in markdown. Code changes clearly documented. Test results included. Examples provided.
